kb3.name: kb3_user
kb3.structure: CREATE TABLE `kb3_user` ( `usr_id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `usr_site` char(16) NOT NULL, `usr_login` char(40) NOT NULL, `usr_pass` char(32) NOT NULL, `usr_pilot_id` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `usr_state` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`usr_id`), UNIQUE KEY `sitelogin` (`usr_site`,`usr_login`) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
